cu.explanation_en: Setting the DRB ciphering to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause the security configuration to fail validation and prevent proper encryption setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the RF simulator model name to an invalid value 'invalid' will cause the simulator initialization to fail and disrupt radio frequency operations.
du.explanation_zh: 將射頻模擬器模型名稱設定為無效值 'invalid' 會導致模擬器初始化失敗，並干擾射頻操作。
